channel.title: Real RS-Remake
channel.description:
Seeing as everyone starts an RS-Remake and never finishes it, I figured that I should be the first one seeing as people are too lazy and quit half way through.
Server & Client Base: Final Devolution 2.6
[u][b]Update Logs:[/b][/u]
[u]30/05/11[/u] [code]2 quests added: Imp catcher and witches potion. Added correct rs drops to men, women, goblins and al-kharid warriors.[/code]
[u]29/05/11[/u] [code]All Lumbridge npcs added. All Varrock npcs added.. 2 quests added: Cooks assistant and sheep shearer. Added jewelry crafting. Men, women, goblins, cows, guards and imps have correct attack/block animations. All al-kharid npcs added. Working gem store and tanner. Bankers added in lumbridge, varrock and al-kharid. (all facing correct way)[/code]
[u]27/05/11[/u] [code]Made all the non combat skills x2 of runescape. Made all the combat skills x4 of runescape. All teleports require the correct levels and give x4 runescape xp.[/code]
Pictures coming soon.
The reason the xp rates are low is so it gives you that old runescape feel with pretty sluggish combat. This is just a quick thread I made so that I have it premade.

item.title: Real RS-Remake
item.dc:creator: @austin_cadle austin cadle
item.description:
@austin_cadle wrote:

Awesome!

Read full topic

item.title: Real RS-Remake
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

I don’t plan on having all the codes or even any codes in the process.

The reason I am making this is to learn different ways to making quite harder rs quests like dragon slayer and hero’s quest etc. I am also trying to re-create clue scrolls fully unlike other servers, perfected combat unlike 95% of the servers out the and several other things. Then when I find that there is a source I like (don’t like any atm) then I will just spend my time re-doing the codes to fit with the base.

Also just made a few updates today. Sorry about no pictures but there will be some soon

Read full topic

item.title: Real RS-Remake
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

[quote=“demps2k9, post:8, topic:396609”]Don’t worry weed. There won’t be any items like dragon claws and all that bs.

Kono-chan I think you would find that hyperion and runesource suck just as bad as delta. As for devo it isn’t as badly programmed.[/quote]

I agree that Hyperion may not be the greatest source released. It has a few memory leaks, and region system errors, but hey what can you do. Overall it’s quality of code is much easier to read and more efficient than that of middle generation private servers such as Deltascape, and Devolution. You’ll find that I’m right once you get more in dept and wonder why parts of your code are not working like you’d want. As a remake you’ll also be sure to notice the strain you’re putting on the server if you program everything Devolution’s way and throw it all in process. This will cause immense lag especially if you throw in as much content as you want to add in there. Regardless, I wish you the best of luck on this project, and hopefully you’ll emerge as a better programmer in turn.

Read full topic

item.title: Real RS-Remake
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:15, topic:396609”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=493782.msg3610221#msg3610221 date=1306518429]
Disagree with Cole 100%. Have none of you even see why all of them fail? They all fail because team-members disagree, someone releases it, etc…

A bigger team would make more problems.
[/quote]

Team disagreements is what leads to a stronger team if they are mature enough to resolve them. Sadly enough, people who originate from Moparscape can’t be that lucky.[/quote]

TBH people from Mopar are more mature and accepting than people from R-S.

Our team had disagreements and such, though we never split up because of it. We split up because we (Paul) ran out of money.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

I am currently working solo and have no development team.

I have worked with devo for a few years alongside delta and they are both similar coding so I don’t see me having too many problems unlike other people.

If you wish to help just let me know. Server is getting finished first before I even start on the website and webclient etc.

item.title: Real RS-Remake
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

Seeing as everyone starts an RS-Remake and never finishes it, I figured that I should be the first one seeing as people are too lazy and quit half way through.

Server & Client Base: Final Devolution 2.6

Update Logs:

30/05/11

2 quests added: Imp catcher and witches potion. Added correct rs drops to men, women, goblins and al-kharid warriors.

29/05/11

All Lumbridge npcs added. All Varrock npcs added.. 2 quests added: Cooks assistant and sheep shearer. Added jewelry crafting. Men, women, goblins, cows, guards and imps have correct attack/block animations. All al-kharid npcs added. Working gem store and tanner. Bankers added in lumbridge, varrock and al-kharid. (all facing correct way)

27/05/11

Made all the non combat skills x2 of runescape. Made all the combat skills x4 of runescape. All teleports require the correct levels and give x4 runescape xp.

Pictures coming soon.

The reason the xp rates are low is so it gives you that old runescape feel with pretty sluggish combat.
This is just a quick thread I made so that I have it premade.
